MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 area of St. Andrews. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:48pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Mount Melville Home Farm substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:10pm on Monday, 08 February 2021
